IBA_J.ConvertListFiles.listFiles

Class listFiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • IBA_J.ConvertListFiles.listFiles.listFiles

  • public class listFiles
extends java.lang.Object
    listFiles is the class representing an input file of type *.lst. A file *.lst will contains a header, event tags and timer tags. The timer tags allow to know when an ADC can receive a signal The event tags indicate if ADCs have received a signal and information corresponding to follows

      • setExtension

        public java.lang.String setExtension(java.lang.String ext)
        This method return an absolute path. This method can be used if you want to save a file in the directory of the lst file
        Parameters:
        ext - An extension to add to the return String
        Returns:
        absolute path of the parent directory of the current file concatened with his name and a new extension
